entry.title: Membership disabled due to bounces
entry.summary: In 2013, a password was set after a debate that inspired the decision to improve Litecoin. The person responsible for fixing up Litecoin gave thanks to Gavin. In June 2015, Warren Togami Jr. received an email and was unsure how it could be causing bounces with a mailing list. The email contained an HTML attachment which was scrubbed.
